name: Ebanashi: Kaiwa
summary: A scary picture. You may find this picture scary. You may think it is abnormal. Or there may be a picture that makes you happy.

name: EbiKore+ Amagami
summary: An enhanced port of Amagami containing numerous bug-fixes and a playable Mahjong minigame, made its way to the PS2, PSP and Vita.

name: Ebola 3
summary: Ebola 3 is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like you’re in a real horror movie.

name: eBaseball Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2022
summary: This title is the largest volume in the history of the series! The classic modes from the previous titles, such as Success, Power Fest, Crown Nine, Pennant, and My Life, have been revamped and upgraded, and a new online battle mode called Power Park has been created where you can play with your own original players!

name: EbonSide
summary: EbonSide is a JRPG with mmo aspects! What does that mean? Well! You can explore the open world of Mest Jest! Get lost in the story about the false Dark champion trying to corrupt the world with a shard of Ebonside! A sword forged by the God of Darkness!

name: eBall
summary: eBall is an old-school multiplayer arena shooter with high speed gameplay and a minimalistic look. An old school rocket and grenade in combination with rattling speed gameplay and predictive air shoot of a classic arena FPS with the power of modern gaming technology.

name: Ebonor
summary: Ebonor is a survival roguelike combining building with fast hack-and-slash combat. Weapons auto-attack, skill combos are free, and the pace is exhilarating—each run feels fresh. There’s no ultimate build, only the strategy that fits each situation to create your own system.

name: Ebola Village
summary: A classic horror inspired by the original survival games of the 90s, Ebola Village is a modern take on a first-person adventure where the main character, Maria, investigates a series of mysterious events.

name: Ebola 2
summary: Ebola 2 is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like you’re in a real horror movie.

name: E-Ball
summary: E-ball is an isometric platform game where players will have to guide their E-ball towards the finish line while collecting valuable orbs and beating the clock. Race through 4 zones and 20 stages of palm sweating challenges from spiked pits of doom to fire spitting totems!

name: Ebenezer and the Invisible World
summary: Embark on a story-rich 2D Metroidvania adventure with breathtaking hand-drawn art, playing as miser-turned-hero Ebenezer Scrooge in a reimagined Victorian-fantasy based on Charles Dickens’ classic novel, A Christmas Carol. Enlist the help of ghosts to save the people of London before it’s too late.

name: Eberouge Special: Koi to Mahou no Gakuen Seikatsu
Ebola
summary: Your main task is to find out who is involved in the spread and experiment on the "E" virus - Ebola, you need to stop the spread of the virus, and at the same time survive yourself! Millions of people may die.

name: Ebbil: Alternative Bible
summary: In Heaven, mistakes have been made. In this story inspired by webseries 'The Mandela Catalogue', follow Archangel Gabriel through a trial of corruption and feigned purity as he explores celestial realms and the rekindling of lost friendships. Will you save the Heavens, or will you see them fall?

name: Eba & Egg: A Hatch Trip
summary: In this cutesy platformer, players control both Eba and its giant, unborn sibling.

name: Ebullition LBVR
summary: Ebullition LBVR is a high fidelity horror multiplayer shooter, designed for Virtual Reality Arcade and support co-location gameplay, that means players can start playing within seconds. This game is designed to be simple to play and without learning curve, so players can start having fun right away, even if they are not a gamer.

name: eBall 2
summary: eBall 2 is a multiplayer arena shooter where players control high-tech balls armed with four different weapons: a rocket launcher, an automatic rifle, a shotgun, and a sniper rifle.

name: Ebola VI Corp
summary: After the war ended on April 4, 2048, few survived. For the first time in history, the most dangerous biological weapons were used. On the first day, most of the planet was destroyed by zombies. Trick them and set a goal - survive.

name: EBE
summary: EBE is an action-adventure game set on a planet in the Lyra constellation. Explore the alien world, interact with it's inhabitants, connect to an alien network, solve puzzles, see distant worlds and secret locations on Earth.

name: E.B.
summary: E.B. is a simple and easy strategy tower defense game where players can match their own skills and trick to defeat enemy tanks.

name: Ebontale
summary: A non-suspicious rpg

name: EbiTapes
summary: Go on an adventure to meet fun new friends, help them out, and create delicious beats along the way! Record the sounds of the world and make your own cool music.

name: Ebony Spire: Heresy
summary:
Crawl, throw, summon and smash your way through 25 levels of pure mishap in this first person turn based dungeon crawling game!
Every item can be used both by the player and against him! And there are more than 100 items (+ stats variations) ranging from potions, to scrolls, weapons and artifacts!

name: Ebuc
summary:
Ebuc is a new addictive Puzzle and Logic Game, that will put brain to work and will challenge your problem solving skills.

You control a little yellow cube with diagonal swipes in a 3D scenario, by pushing other Cubes your mission is to find a way and get to the red target.

name: EB Worlds
summary: An educational game meant to teach the principles of game development. The tutorial levels present the players with games that are not working properly, and tasks them to change the behavior of the objects in them to proceed.

name: eBaseball Professional Yakyuu Spirits 2021: Grand Slam
summary: The eBaseball Professional Yakyuu Spirits series features realistic graphics that faithfully reproduce the facial expressions, forms, and gestures of the players. In this game, players will have the ability to play as all baseball athletes from the start of 2021 and will receive free updates.

name: EBaseball MLB Pro Spirit
summary: A baseball mobile app game by Konami it has monthly game modes that shifts every month

name: Ebola 4
summary: You open your eyes, it's dark all around. Are you in an underground bunker, alone with your thoughts... or are you not alone there? Fear, apocalypse, darkness swallowed the world, most people are infected. You are at the epicenter... And can you change something?

name: Ebon Light
summary: A dark tale of old secrets and romance!

name: Ebony
summary: Ebony is a first-person psychological horror game with paranormal effects. Can you survive at night in an old mansion? Adam inherited from his grandmother.

name: eBaseball Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2020
summary: Nintendo Switch is equipped with “Power Fes” “LIVE Scenario,” and “Crown Nine” modes for the first time. And on PlayStation 4 allows playing together cooperatively up to 4 players. Enjoy baseball with your friends and family.

name: Eburnean
summary:
Wanna fight bosses that do silly puns in an arena full of paint ?
Well, we have that ! Pick among the 8 weird, but unique... let's say "heroes", then you are ready to kick asses !
